results.title: Road bike
results.description: Road bicycles are bikes that are being built for travelling at speed on paved road.

results.title: Recumbent
results.description: A bike that places the rider in a laid-back recicling position.

results.title: Hydraulic bike
results.description: A hydraulic bike is a chailess bicycle that transfers power to the pedals by means of a liquid passing through tubes from hydraulic pump motor & back.

results.title: Mountain bike
results.description: Is is designed for offroad cycling.

results.title: City bike
results.description: City bikes are designed for recreational cyclist who want to do short trips on paved roads.

results.title: Fat bicycle
results.description: It rides on snow, sand, mud.

results.title: Touring bike
results.description: Designed for all-day rides & casual tours.

results.title: BMX bike
results.description: Bicycle used for sport, specifically stunds pr racing riding.

results.title: Cruiser bike
results.description: A cruiser bicycle, also known as a beach cruiser or (formerly) motobike, is a bicycle that usually combines balloon tires, an upright seating posture, a single-speed drivetrain, and straightforward steel construction with expressive styling.
